Package xbird.xquery.func.math

Class Summary
Abs fn:abs($arg as numeric?) as numeric?.
Ceiling fn:ceiling($arg as numeric?) as numeric?.
Floor fn:floor($arg as numeric?) as numeric?.
NumericFunction
If the argument is the empty sequence, the empty sequence is returned. For xs:float and xs:double arguments, if the argument is "NaN", "NaN" is returned. Except for fn:abs(), for xs:float and xs:double arguments, if the argument is positive or negative infinity, positive or negative infinity is returned.
Round fn:round($arg as numeric?) as numeric?.
RoundHalfToEven The value returned is the nearest (that is, numerically closest) numeric to $arg that is a multiple of ten to the power of minus $precision.
